price: 155. (Saalix) wuxuu yidhi: Tani waa Hal9; waxay u leedahay xaq inay cabto (biyo) maalin, idinkuna waxaad u leedihin xaq inaad cabtaan (biyo) maalin la yaqaan.
arabic: قَالَ هَٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةٞ لَّهَا شِرۡبٞ وَلَكُمۡ شِرۡبُ يَوۡمٖ مَّعۡلُومٖ
footnotes: 9. Hal Mucjiso ahaan loogu soo diray Calaamo ahaan ka timid xagga Alle.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla hādhihi nāqatun lahā shir'bun walakum shir'bu yawmin maʿlūmin
